title: Extra Wide Comfort Fit Athletic Quarter Socks (Pack of 3) Fits Up to a 6E Width, Made in USA
description: WIDER IN THE FOOT AND ANKLE. 3 Pairs of Extra Wide Athletic Quarter (ankle height) Socks
GOES ON EASY AND STAYS UP! Fits over casts and Unna Boots. Comfortable, non-constricting. Superior stretch
DESIGNED SPECIFICALLY FOR WIDE FEET. Perfect for people with Edema or any condition where feet, ankles, or legs are wide or swollen
PLEASE DO NOT SIZE UP. It is important to use your correct shoe size for proper fit. Refer to our size chart
MADE IN THE USA! No shortcuts in materials or workmanship.
The Extra Wide Sock Company stands behind our brand and superb quality. 100% satisfaction. Your feet will be happier!
